entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of drizzle after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
